resources.string:
Medical Record Management: EVERCARE is a mobile application that assists elderly people, staff, and caregivers to manage medical records, including tracking medical appointments and recording vital signs.
Chat: It provides a chat feature that allows users to communicate with each other, facilitating easy communication between caregivers, elderly individuals, and staff members.
Pill Reminder: EVERCARE includes a pill reminder feature that helps users manage their medication schedule, ensuring they take the right medications at the right times.
Emergency Help: In case of emergencies, users can quickly access the emergency help feature, which notifies designated contacts and emergency services for immediate assistance.
Remote Monitoring: EVERCARE offers remote monitoring functionality, allowing caregivers and family members to monitor the health and well-being of elderly individuals from a distance.
